title: Snorefest
review: Hollywood needs to stop making these meaningless sequels. They are for losers and only made for cash hoarding because if Hollywood was lacking cash it would not pay all these no-talents in the millions.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode VIII - The Last Jedi
title: This is what happens in a right-wing conservative capitalist society
review: They need to keep making and remaking and rebooting and sequelizing and making money by dishing out rubbish even though there is no call for the movies, there is no story and no reason for any of this crap.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
title: Jar Jar Abrams Never Watched Star Wars Before
review: Or he would know that the rebels won in Episode VI!This is the Worst Star Wars-related show so farI hate every scene of this reboot, there is always a joke, it does bore even if it says 'Star Wars.' This remake is the reason why I don't drive to the cinemaanymore, it reflects the era very well unfortunately. I hope they cancel Star Wars and let it recover from the emarassment for years.
